originalText.text: Dr. Karl is one of the most thorough and kindest doctors I have ever met. He is funny and disarming and genuinely cares about his patients. U would recommend him highly. A young and open minded doctor with a wealth of knowledge. I’m sure he’s done and will do great things.  Maria

text.text: Dr. Karl is one of the most thorough and kindest doctors I have ever met. He is funny and disarming and genuinely cares about his patients. U would recommend him highly. A young and open minded doctor with a wealth of knowledge. I’m sure he’s done and will do great things.  Maria

originalText.text: I had the misfortune of seeing him on the last day he was at the lawrenceville  New Jersey location. He was indifferent at best and when I stated that I thought stress was a contributing factor to why I was seeing him he said and I quote, "well since today is my last day here let me take five minutes and tell you about the stresses in my life".  I was stunned and disgusted by his unprofessional behavior and could not wait to leave.  If you want to see a doctor who clearly is only in it for the money he would be your best bet.

originalText.text: I found him to be caring and very interested in my lifestyle habits. He took the time to discuss in detail my issues and followed up on all the items we talked about.  I would be comfortable using him in the future.

originalText.text: Great doctor who is caring and compassionate!
